com.anotherservice.io

Class Zip

  • Object
    • Zip

  • public class Zip
extends Object
    This class provides easy access to ZIP file content with internal in-memory representation. One can easily add or remove files from an archive, (un)zip archives, merge archives,...
    Author:
    Simon Uyttendaele
    Note:
    Since all work is performed in-memory, the size of the contained files is constrained to the memory limits
